Detailed Description

Some classes to read/write the DB. ROOT doesn't know about them.

Function Documentation

int RunDB::GetRunNearDate ( const std::string &  datestr = "",
bool  isMC = false 
)

Utility functions.

Get the number of the run that was nearest to the time specified. if datestr=="", use today. should be YYYY-MM-DD [HH:MM[:SS]]
